body.name: Hexgears GK715 Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, 104 Keys Full Size Wired Computer Keyboard, Hot Swappable Kailh Box Switches, ABS Keycaps, Blue Backlit Gaming Keyboard for PC/Laptop
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 8 mins
features: 104-key Full-size Mechanical Keyboard: The 104-key design and ergonomic design of the keyboard height provides a good gaming feel, retaining the usual number keys, perfect for the office and gaming.

Premium Tactile Experience - Kailh Box mechanical switches provide accurate tactile and audio responses, both providing an unparalleled typing experience, allowing you to execute every keystroke with lightning-fast precision.

Plug-in Switches: Kaihl click-in plug-in switches for maximum durability, giving your mechanical keyboard a lifespan of up to 1 million keystrokes. Hot-swappable PCBs allow you to freely swap out 3-pin/5-pin switches to experience the feel and sound of different shaft bodies and match your custom keyboard.

Durable Design: The ABS double shot keycaps are extremely durable and hard wearing. This rechargeable mechanical keyboard has a battery life of up to 300 hours (based on 8 hours of operation per day with the LEDs off).

Wide Compatibility：This is a wired mechanical gaming keyboard that is compatible with Windows/ MacOS/ Android. the gaming keyboard can be freely connected to laptops, desktops, PC computers, tablets etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Mechanical Keyboard
reviews.reviewText: this was an excellent value and very high quality. the keyboard backlight looks better in person and the keys have a great feel. 9.5/10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, Sleek, and Cute!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this keyboard so much! Honestly, I bought it to replace my Razer Blackwidow and I definitely don't regret it :) if you're looking for a decently priced keyboard for your games and every day tasks, I highly recommend this one! Especially the brown switches lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great keyboard, ka-chonk instead of clicky, but works great as a mechanical.
reviews.reviewText: I like the simple backlight, though it would help DRASTICALLY if the keycaps themselves were illuminated. Especially given the Ctrl/Shift/etc and Spacebar, etc. The legs are dual-position for height, and the keys themselves have a nice "ka-chonk", not really the full mechanical "click", but it works perfectly for an entry level and not-too loud Mechanical! Overall - recommended, especially if you're just getting into mechanicals. It's attractive but not too loud-clicky nor garishly-lighted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a good keyboard. I've tested a lot of keyboards in the past and this one works well and looks awesome. I do a lot of gaming on mouse and keyboard and this one does not disappoint. The button presses are clean and concise. The lighting looks great and has many different adjustments that let you customize it and change it easily. The price seems a bit high when compared to other keyboards in the class but you also need to consider the custom keycaps it uses and how great they look. I have another more expensive keyboard that I prefer for gaming but I switched the 'enter' and 'space bar' keycaps with this one because they look really cool. Overall this is a great keyboard and for the right price I definitely recommend it for gaming or even just everyday typing tasks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun color combination and style with solid key switches
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard has such an awesome appearance with the blue, purple, and cream and graphic enhanced keys! With that though it is a little strange to have backlighting that doesn't shine through the symbols on the keys. The symbols are mostly well printed but a few of them have breaks in the symbol but are still readable. The lighting is bright and has quite a few different styles that are easy to change with the function button and then using the alternate labels on the arrow and above the arrow keys.The key switches in this keyboard feel high quality with a moderate amount of activation distance, lower than average sound, and an otherwise responsive feel to them. This keyboard works well for both gaming and typing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love my keyboard so much
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome keyboard. The backlighting is very pretty and the keys are comfortable on your fingers. I haven't stopped using it since the day I pulled it out of the box. I'd totally buy more colors if available in the future, but I really like the pink. It fits the rest of my setup perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent mechanical keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I've only been using the Hexgears GK715 keyboard for a few hours, but I'm already really impressed with it. It's a great keyboard for both gaming and typing, and it's also very affordable.The first thing I noticed about the GK715 is that it's very well built (built like a tank, actually). The case is made of high-quality aluminum, and the keycaps are made of ABS plastic. The keyboard feels very solid and sturdy, and it doesn't flex at all when I'm typing or gaming.The GK715 has a full-sized layout, which means that it has all the keys that you need for everyday use. Nevertheless, it's still compact enough to fit on a relatively small desk. The keyboard also has a high-quality USB-C cable, which makes it easy to connect and use.One of the things that I really like about the GK715 is the hot-swappable switches. This means that I can easily swap out the switches for different ones if I want to change the feel of the keyboard. I've been using the Gateron Browns that came with the keyboard, and I'm really happy with them. They're tactile and smooth, and they're perfect for both gaming and typing.The GK715 also has a lot of features that are great for gamers. It has full N-key rollover, which means that all of your keystrokes will always register, even if you're pressing multiple keys at the same time. The keyboard also has a polling rate of 1000Hz, so it can register your keystrokes very quickly.Overall, I'm really impressed with the Hexgears GK715 keyboard. It's a great keyboard for both gaming and typing, and it's also relatively affordable. If you're looking for a new keyboard, I highly recommend checking it out.Here are some pros and cons of the Hexgears GK715 keyboard:Pros:Well-builtDecent valueHot-swappable switchesFull N-key rollover1000Hz polling rateComes with a detachable USB-C cableABS keycaps that are made exceptionally well and compare favorably to more expensive PBT keycaps.Cons:The keyboard is not backlitI know that ABS keycaps are often viewed as inferior to PBT keycaps, but I was really impressed with the quality of the ABS keycaps on the GK715. They're thick and durable, and they have a nice, smooth texture.Overall, I think the Hexgears GK715 keyboard is a good value for the price. It's well-built, affordable, and has a lot of features that are great for gamers. If you're looking for a new keyboard, I highly recommend checking it out.
